full_summary:
# EE519-240401: Redevelopment of Terminal Operations Area, Cap-aux-Meules Port

* **Publication Date:** 2023-07-17
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-08-17 14:00:00

* **Procurement Category:** CNST
* **Procurement Method:** Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)
* **Trade Agreements:** *Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC) (Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA))

## Contract Details

## Description

The redevelopment of the terminal operations area at the Cap-aux-Meules Port involves [Please insert description of the work]. The successful bidder will be required to provide highway and road maintenance services, as specified in the Request for Proposal document.

## Request for Proposal

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been posted on the [insert URL] website, requesting proposals from qualified bidders. Proposal submissions are due by 2023-08-17 14:00:00. The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.
